abstract: Blues musician Son House will be honored with Mississippi Blues Trail marker dedication in Rochester, New York, city he lived in for 23 years; House and his musical influence will also be celebrated with August 2015 four-day blues festival, Journey to the Son, at Rochester's Geva Theatre Center, highlighted by reading of Revival: The Resurrection of Son House, Keith Glover’s play about House's life.
lead_paragraph: A four-day festival, Journey to the Son, will explore the music of Son House, whose Rochester years will also be commemorated with a Mississippi Blues Trail marker.

headline.main: Son House Inspires a Rochester Blues Festival
headline.print_headline: The Man From Rochester, by Way of Mississippi

snippet: A four-day festival, Journey to the Son, will explore the music of Son House, whose Rochester years will also be commemorated with a Mississippi Blues Trail marker.
